text:
Hello!!! Is there a possiblity to add boolean field directly in blog post template? (not in a module).
What I mean is - I need to have two separate images as my hero image for a blog post template.
One hero image will be added in Blog Post settings and will be displayed in social preview while another one will be visible on a blog post HubSpot page.
Is there any way to implement on/off switch on a template level that would allow me to switch on/off visible hero images?
Some of the blog posts will have the same image both for social preview and the page and some won't.
Thank you for any help!!!
